explains: n. （数字）四十五；（每面一首歌的）45转留声唱片；0.45英寸口径的手枪

sentences.cn: 十三加上四十五等于多少？

sentences.en: On the foreign exchanges, the U.S. dollar is up point forty-five.
sentences.cn: 在外汇交易所，美元上涨了0.45个百分点。

sentences.en: Menstruation may cease when a woman is anywhere between forty-five and fifty years of age.
sentences.cn: 月经可能在女性45至50岁之间停止。
